Text:
Your comments (and uploads) are appreciated however this will have to do. The tapes and VOB's are gone.

   Popular torrents get lots of seeders. Odd ball oldies like this do not. They get weaker as time goes by. Now that this is 100% I'll only be feeding at 5-15kb/s. The 700mb file should maintain more seeders and that helps leechers a year down the road.

   If everyone just seeded to just over 1 this system would work a lot better.
